description: All Americans feel an exciting tingle when they hear the familiar jolly jingle that signifies Mister Softee is near. Since 1956, Mister Softee trucks have been roaming the nation, twisting up and serving out delicious soft serve ice cream cones. Today there are over 600 trucks towing around tasty treats, including in Reading, where folks have a special connection to Mister Softee since they’re close neighbors with Philadelphia, its town of origin. Wherever you find Mister Softee himself, with his whimsical ice cream cone head and big smile, you know you’re about to indulge in a creamy treat with a twist that can’t be missed.
name: Mister Softee
